title: Cricket
description:
A cricket, a hopping insect that makes a chirping sound. Depicted as a brown or green cricket in full profile on its six legs facing left, with long antennae and large, bent back legs.

May resemble or be used to represent a grasshopper (including locusts) and other bugs. May also be used to represent metaphorical crickets, or "silence," as of a disapproving or uninterested audience.

Not to be confused with üèè Cricket Game, the sport.

Google's cricket was previously green.
apple_vendor_description: The cricket emoji on Apple devices is a small, meticulously detailed illustration, capturing the insect's segmented body and delicate legs with realistic shading and texture. Apple's signature 3D rendering gives the cricket a lifelike presence, with smooth gradients and subtle highlights that suggest its natural form. This emoji can represent the insect itself, the game of cricket, or evoke a sense of nature and quiet evenings.
